.. _reference:

###################
pylayers reference
###################

:Release: |version|
:Date: |today|

.. module:: pylayers

This reference manual details functions, modules, and objects
included in PyLayers, describing what they are and what they do.
For learning how to use PyLayers, see also :ref:`user`.

   :maxdepth: 2

   -------------

   gis.rst

   Signal 
   --------

   signal.rst

   Antenna and Propagation  
   ------------------------
   antprop.rst
